Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

Me and another forum member, Captain Sierra are working on doing a cooperative series of Kerbal Space Program in .21!

Basically we are only going to be using a handful of mods and building space stations and bases and other common Kerbal things! Our goal is to build cool looking stations and bases, why? Because why not? and its fun to do in the process.

So far we have the first station core up in orbit with a small fuel section and escape system at the ready!

The first video is below the 2nd is uploading right now and will be added when I get home from school!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24s00hZqA80

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mYVogYg62N4

Edited October 15, 2013 by 7499275
